channel.title: Make an NPC teleport you closer during combat
channel.description: I want my boss monster to teleport you closer to it if you run away. I've tried modifying some teleport methods but to no success, I am running project insanity. could someone maybe help?

item.title: Make an NPC teleport you closer during combat
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:8, topic:421944”][quote author=Pblord7 link=topic=524625.msg3819830#msg3819830 date=1321669847]
Way to be a dick, you must really want your players to die
[/quote]

Its for a custom boss, Kinda like nex, I want it to be difficult, there you get teleblocked by the monster and then he just really fucks things up for ya, anyone got any ideas?[/quote]

Sounds like what im doing for my pvp boss, Except the boss will randomly appear in battle.

Read full topic

item.title: Make an NPC teleport you closer during combat
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Do something along the lines of checking to see if the coords are so many x/y away from the enemy then have him tele, and have him tele to the x and y that is just above the npc.

Read full topic
